title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - New city update and local legend now available
description:
In this video we will have a look a both City Update number 6 as well as the latest local legend which have been released for Flight Simulator 2020. First we will review the content which is available on the Asobo site and after that see how we can install the City update followed by validating which things have been added to the world map.
After that we will look at how to get the local legend and we find out a nice surprise.

0:00 intro
0:10 City Update 6
3:42 Local Legend 15 
5:05 How to get City Update 6
6:28 What is added to the world map
8:41 Closer look at Local Legend 15
